name: BoyMeetsCave
description:
What's this?

To put it bluntly, it's a game like "Metroid" without the enemies.

It's 50% exploration, 30% puzzle, and 20% action.

I recommend it to people who want to play an unfriendly exploration game with no explanation at all.

This game has an auto-save feature.

Controls

[A][D]：Move

[W]：Jump

[Delete]：Press and hold to delete the saved data and restart the game.
